title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, target audience, and gather requirements from stakeholders.

title: Design Virtual Reality Environment for VRMortgageAdvisor
description:
Create a comprehensive design for the VR environment including user interface, navigation, interactive elements, data flow, and integration with mortgage calculation and recommendation engines. Focus on immersive 3D graphics, spatial audio, hand/gesture tracking, voice commands, and ensure accessibility and responsiveness to various devices. Consider incorporating visual feedback mechanisms, intuitive UI/UX designs, and optimizing performance for a seamless user experience. Also, integrate virtual learning modules and interactive tools for financial education. In addition, consider the following points: 
1. Prioritize mobile-first approach while designing.
2. Ensure that the design complies with VR accessibility guidelines.
3. Integrate analytics to track user behavior and improve the platform based on insights.
4. Collaborate closely with other teams such as UX/UI, frontend, backend, and devops during the design process.
5. Conduct usability testing regularly to refine and iterate the design.
dependencies: Define User Personas and Journey Maps

title: Develop Financial Education Content
description: Research and create educational content on mortgages, personal finance, and related topics to be integrated into the VR platform.

title: Design and Implement VR Mortgage Advisor
description: Develop the virtual mortgage advisor component, including personalized mortgage options, calculations, recommendations, and integration with external data sources for real-time mortgage rates and financial data. The advisor should also provide immersive financial education and be designed to work seamlessly within the overall VR environment of the platform. Additionally, ensure that the data privacy and security aspects are prioritized throughout the development process.
dependencies: Integrate with External Financial Data APIs

title: Develop VR User Interface
description: Create the user interface for the VR platform, integrating the financial education content and mortgage advisor components.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and develop the database schema (including tables for user information, mortgage options, educational content, and application logs), implement data management system for efficient storage and retrieval of data, and ensure data security by implementing necessary encryption methods.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement robust security and privacy measures to safeguard user data. This includes encryption (AES-256 for data at rest and TLS 1.2+ for data in transit), access controls (Role Based Access Control, Least Privilege Principle, implementing OAuth/OIDC for authentication), anonymization techniques (e.g., pseudonymization, hashing, and consideration of differential privacy where applicable), compliance with GDPR, CCPA, PCI-DSS, and other relevant regulations. Create policies for data handling, incident response, and regular security audits (including penetration testing). Ensure these measures are implemented throughout the entire system, not just at specific touchpoints (e.g., frontend, backend, database). Collaborate closely with all team members to ensure integration of these measures from project planning through to deployment. Additionally, consider incorporating principles such as Privacy by Design and Data Protection by Default. Incorporate security features in the software development life cycle (SDLC), including secure coding practices, code reviews, and automated vulnerability scanning tools.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including functional, usability, and performance testing for the VR platform.
dependencies: Design and Implement VR Mortgage Advisor

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring for the VR platform.
